title: REBT - The Science Of Re-Programming Your Mind!
headline: Learn how to improve your personal development with this free online Rational Emotive Behavior Therapy course.
description: This free online Rational Emotive Behavior Therapy (REBT) course will teach you how to deprogram old, negative thought patterns and replace them with positive new ones. Rational Emotive Behaviour Therapy is the highly acclaimed science of reprogramming negative or detrimental thought processes, which you can use to regain control over your emotions and transform your life. Take this free online course today to begin.
courseDescription:
Discover how the mind works through Rational Emotive Behavior Therapy (REBT), and how you can deprogram old, negative thought patterns and replace them quickly and easily with positive new patterns.     

The course begins by introducing you to the science behind how your mind and emotions work. You'll learn how to gain mastery over difficult emotions and quickly program in new positive habits, attitudes, and belief systems. You'll also be shown how you can apply REBT as a self-help therapy for almost any mental issues or blocks.

The tools found in REBT have successfully transformed the lives of thousands of people, so start the course today and don’t miss this opportunity to learn the hidden secrets of psychology from celebrity trainer Prof. Paul Cline who has condensed over 35 years of learning into this quick and easy course.

Start Course Now
